name: Goblet (Kelchpokal)
maker: Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Wolfgang Vitl, or of Sebastian Höchstetter
description: Goblet (Kelchpokal); Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Wolfgang Vitl (Austrian, active 1534 - 1540), or of Sebastian Höchstetter (Austrian, active 1540 - 1569); Hall, Austria; 1535 - 1555; Free- and mold-blown colorless (purplish gray) glass with gilding; 18.9 x 12.4 cm (7 7/16 x 4 7/8 in.); 84.DK.542; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Goblet (Kelchpokal)
medium: Free- and mold-blown colorless (purplish gray) glass with gilding
